title-english: Bint Al Nil Visits Commander-in-Chief of the Army
title-arabic: بنت النيل في زيارة القائد العام
creator: Bint Al Nil
description-english: This article features an interview by Dr. Doria Shafiq with General Mohamed Naguib, Commander-in-Chief of the Egyptian Army at his office. His views about a number of issues are highlighted, including the Law of Enlistment and women, reform, and public demands to purge corrupt elements.
description-arabic: تتحدث هذه المقالة عن استقبال اللواء محمد نجيب للدكتورة درية شفيق بمقر القيادة العامة للقوات المسلحة، وتستعرض آراءه في عدة قضايا، منها قانون التجنيد والمرأة والإصلاح وتطهير البلاد من الفساد.
subject: Women's rights -- Egypt; Women -- Arab countries -- Periodicals
source: From: Bint Al Nil Visits Commander-in-Chief of the Army
rights: Women and Memory Forum are copyright holders of the Bint al-Nil Journal Collection.
repository: Rare Books and Special Collections Digital Library
